revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - See comments for changes to metadata. Text: l. 1, fix num tags. Line 2-4: Change corr to reg. --> Σκορπίῳ. Line 3: --> Τοξό[τ]ῃ. Line 5: add period after Κρ[ι]ῷ. Indicate that the missing letters at beginning of line 6 are uncertain (there may have been nothing written there).

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - See comments for changes to metadata. Text: l. 1, fix num tags. Line 2-4: Change corr to reg. --> Σκορπίῳ. Line 3: --> Τοξό[τ]ῃ. Line 5: add period after Κρ[ι]ῷ. Indicate that the missing letters at beginning of line 6 are uncertain (there may have been nothing written there).

General - Meta: in biblio add no. 13946 with text no. 4246. To biblio 15610 add p. 259-260. Move AD to before the year in Display Name. Delete 'erasure' in keywords. Bookform = sheet. Script type = cursive. General Notes: written against the fibers; back is blank. It is unclear if any text is missing at the beginning of line 6. Fix provenance and add TM and Pleiades geo refs.
